Uses of Class
com.stephengware.java.games.chess.state.Board

  • Packages that use Board 
    Package Description
    com.stephengware.java.games.chess.state
    Data structures for representing the state of a chess game and for searching the space of possible next moves.

    • Uses of Board in com.stephengware.java.games.chess.state

      Fields in com.stephengware.java.games.chess.state declared as Board 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Board State.board
      The current configuration of the board
      Methods in com.stephengware.java.games.chess.state with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Piece PGN.getNewLocation(Board before, Board after, Piece piece)
      Given the state of a chess board before and after a move and a piece to track, this method returns the piece at the location it occupied before the move.
